span.style: font-size: large; letter-spacing: 0.07px; text-align: left; font-family: Tahoma, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica;

span.span: We hope that the provided content and information on our website is both helpful and user friendly to you. You will find a variety of resources that we have intentionally made available so that you can easily and on your time table find what it is that you need. If you are unable to find information that could be added please let us know.

span.br: At Vienna High School, we pride ourselves on high academic achievement, a strong sense of community and active parent involvement. We serve students in a district that covers 300 square miles in Johnson County. Our students primarily come from

br.span: Grade Schools. We also enjoy sharing the story of our successful students and teachers with the community that supports them. We tell our story through
. Our district hashtag, #viennaeagles, labels our social media posts.

At Vienna High School, we strive to graduate active, self-actualized 21st century citizens who will be caring, career-directed, value-oriented individuals, competent in communications and problem solving. We further commit to provide our students with the opportunities necessary to develop skills in creative and critical thinking, skills in living and working both independently and cooperatively, as well as knowledge of technology and interdependence in a global and multicultural society. Vienna will strive to inspire students to become positive, lifelong learners.

div.p:
Main Campus
601 North First Street, Vienna, IL
